import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Row, Form, Col, Button, Alert } from 'react-bootstrap' import Axios from 'axios' import '../App.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; //import Axios from 'axios' export default class CreatePost extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.onFileChange = this.onFileChange.bind(this); this.onSubmit = this.onSubmit.bind(this); this.state = { title: '', poster: '', image: '', overview: '', content: '' } } onFileChange(e) { this.setState({ image: e.target.files[0] }) } onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() const formData = new FormData() formData.append('profileImg', this.state.profileImg) Axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/user-profile", formData, { title, poster, overview, content }).then(res => { console.log(res) }) } render() { return (
) } }
Title onChangeInput(e)} /> {/*
*/} Poster onChangeInput(e)} /> {/*
*/} Image onChangeInput(e)} /> {/*
*/} Overview onChangeInput(e)} /> Content
